section.p: A role that stores the items issued in a prosthetics transaction.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] acquisitionSource with data type Code
The source from which an item was acquired, either VA or Commercial.

Contains zero or one [0..1] prostheticHCPCS with data type Code
"The Prosthetics HCPCS code for the item. HCPCS is a uniform method to report professional services, procedures and supplies for healthcare providers and medical suppliers. "

Contains zero or one [0..1] quantity with data type Integer Ratio
The number of units that was issued or repaired for the transaction

Contains zero or more [0..*] itemInformation, where its type is Prosthetics Appliance
Informaiton pertinent to the prosthetic device for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] vendor, where its type is Vendor
The company from which an item was or is to be purchased. The vendor may or may not be the same as the manufacturer.

Contains zero or one [0..1] acquisitionSource with data type Code
The source from which an item was acquired, either VA or Commercial.

Contains zero or one [0..1] prostheticHCPCS with data type Code
"The Prosthetics HCPCS code for the item. HCPCS is a uniform method to report professional services, procedures and supplies for healthcare providers and medical suppliers. "

Contains zero or one [0..1] quantity with data type Integer Ratio
The number of units that was issued or repaired for the transaction

Contains zero or more [0..*] itemInformation, where its type is Prosthetics Appliance
Informaiton pertinent to the prosthetic device for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] vendor, where its type is Vendor
The company from which an item was or is to be purchased. The vendor may or may not be the same as the manufacturer.
